title: Christmas Special
subtitle: Limited edition festive cupcakes, available for pre-order now!

description.title: A Taste of Christmas Cheer
description.p1: Get into the holiday spirit with our exclusive Christmas Gingerbread Cupcakes. These delightful treats feature a spiced gingerbread cake base, topped with a luscious cream cheese frosting and a sprinkle of festive magic.
description.p2: Perfect for holiday parties, family gatherings, or just as a special treat for yourself. But hurry, they are available for a limited time only and in limited quantities!

stock.title: Availability
stock.note: Pre-order now to secure your batch!

banner.text: Limited Time: Christmas Cupcake Pre-order is Live!

modal.title: Order Christmas Cupcakes
modal.subtitle: Secure your festive gingerbread cupcakes. Limited stock available!

toast.title: Pre-order Confirmed!
toast.description: Your order for {{count}} box(es) is confirmed for pickup on {{date}} at {{time}}.
